Text:
WARNING FOR PS3 USERS: This vid after about 15min has the audio cut out due to some cinava crap...really irritating.  Im assuming it works fine for PC tho?  Havent tried.
Amazing quality up until then though!!! hahaha.

Works on PC through DivX Plus Player,  Glitchy in Winamp.

Cinava protection apparently only affects playback on blu ray devices..   such as ps3.    I got 15mins 30 sec before the audio dropped out streaming via ps3..   Wound up just playing with DivX Plus with hdmi into tv/surround and it worked a treat.
